clinical_study.brief_title: Comorbidities and Outcomes in Early Rheumatoid Arthritis
clinical_study.official_title: The Epidemiology of Cardiovascular Disease, Haematological Abnormalities, and Other Comorbidities in Early Rheumatoid Arthritis in the United Kingdom and Their Associations With Important Outcomes

brief_summary.textblock: Identify the burden of comorbidity at the time of diagnosis of rheumatoid arthritis. Identify the impact of comorbidity present at diagnosis on cardiovascular disease, death, rheumatoid arthritis disease progression and infections.

primary_outcome.measure: Time to a cardiovascular composite of incident myocardial infarction, stroke, or heart failure
primary_outcome.time_frame: From diagnosis to loss to follow-up, or 1st January 2017
From diagnosis to loss to follow-up, or 1st January 2017

primary_outcome.measure: Time to a composite of incident infections.
primary_outcome.time_frame: From diagnosis to loss to follow-up, or 1st January 2017
primary_outcome.description: The composite will comprise incident upper respiratory tract infections, bronchitis, influenza-like illnesses, pneumonia, intestinal infectious diseases, herpes simplex, skin and soft tissue infections, urinary tract infections, and genital and perineal infections

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From diagnosis to loss to follow-up, or 1st January 2017
From diagnosis to loss to follow-up, or 1st January 2017
From diagnosis to loss to follow-up, or 1st January 2017

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to an extended cardiovascular composite comprised of incident myocardial infarction, stroke, heart failure, coronary artery disease, percutaneous coronary intervention, and angina
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From diagnosis to loss to follow-up, or 1st January 2017

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to a joint operations composite comprised of incident joint operations on shoulder, elbow, wrist, hand, hip, knee, ankle and foot
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From diagnosis to loss to follow-up, or 1st January 2017
